name: SockSoho
headline: Building world's largest men fashion brand powered by technology
description: SockSoho is India's largest DTC sock brand. We are on a mission to build the next Uniqlo and socks is just our starting point.

founders.name: Simarpreet Singh
founders.description: CS engineer who found his passion in growth marketing

founders.name: Pritika Mehta
founders.description: Pritika is a Data Scientist turned Entrepreneur. She graduated with M.S. in Artificial Intelligence from the State University of New York. She was also chosen as the Ambassador for TED talks and a Global Shaper by World Economic Forum. Pritika has worked with Bank of America and TripAdvisor in the US and multiple startups before venturing into startups.

## CELEBS & SOCKSOHO
Hollywood and Bollywood celebrities are often spotted wearing SockSoho socks. Our clientele includes top CEOs, Celebs, Entrepreneurs, and even Sheiks of Dubai.
### Bollywood Celeb
## Vicky Kaushal
in Yellowstone Edition by SockSoho
### Legendary U2 Rockstars
## BONO & The EDGE
were recently spotted checking out Steve Jobs Edition by SockSoho
## World's most comfortable sock
SockSoho socks for men are crafted with premium Combed Cotton and Scottish Lisle Cotton. These socks are engineered with Korean technology to provide perfect grip to your feet without making you feel tight. 
## CUSTOMER REVIEWS
"The socks are just great. My dad loved them. Designs are just very cool and the cotton that is used is so soft and comfortable. These socks have now become his favorite. The best socks out there! ðŸ™Œ"
**MY DAD LOVES THEM!**
"Absolutely in love with your collection! Best part is the elastic at top. That's the first thing I check before buying socks. Great grip and are not at all tight. I can wear your socks for hours without worrying."
**GREAT GRIP AND ELASTIC**
"I have gifted your sock gift boxes to almost every man in my family and every time I get the same reaction - WOWWW!! Love how you guys have converted a simple clothing item into such a luxury product."
**BEST GIFT FOR MEN**
"The designs are elegant and perfect for every occasion. Using them from so long and very happy with the designs and they still feel new. Great work!"
**MY FAVORITE ACCESSORY**
"Wore your socks on my wedding. They stole the thunder of my three piece suit and sherwani. Your socks are super soft and comfortable! SockSoho socks are the only sock I wear now."
**HIGHLIGHT OF MY WEDDING**
"I cannot wear any other socks because I cannot bear the tightness. But I can keep SockSoho socks on for the entire day and they do not even leave a mark. Your elastic is the best!"
**EASY FOR DIABETIC FOOT**
[SEE ALL REVIEWS](https://socksoho.com/</pages/reviews>)
##  FEATURED IN 
![](https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0249/5699/3587/files/socksoho_news_latest1_1.png?v=1615892686)
## About SockSoho
SockSoho is India's fastest growing premium sock brand for men. Made with premium Combed Cotton & Scottish Lisle yarns SockSoho socks are designed with special technology to provide maximum comfort to your feet.

Founded in 2020 and located in San Francisco, SockSoho has quickly established itself as India's largest DTC sock brand. Initially focused on socks, SockSoho is not stopping there. They see potential for expansion, hinting at a vision to become the next Uniqlo, but that's just the beginning. With a team of 22 passionate employees, they craft their products using premium Combed Cotton and Scottish Lisle yarns, ensuring maximum comfort thanks to the engineering marvels of Korean technology.

Their product line includes a diverse range of socksâ€”no-show styles, ankle lengths, and regular types, as well as themed gift boxes for both men and women. Their offerings have garnered a notable clientele, including celebrities from Hollywood to Bollywood, making their socks not just a fashion accessory but a symbol of luxury.

At SockSoho, customer feedback is a big deal. Raving reviews speak to the luxurious feel, impressive grip, and thoughtful designs that cater to making socks stylish and comfortable. Plus, they offer perks like free shipping on all orders, making shopping an enjoyable experience.

If youâ€™re curious about their stylish offerings or want a sneak peek at their collection, you can check them out at [SockSoho.com](https://socksoho.com). The future looks bright for this up-and-coming fashion brand thatâ€™s all about taking footwear to the next levelâ€”one sock at a time.
